Transparency is the foundation for meaningful social change, effective public engagement, and thoughtful decision making.

We help people collect, understand, and share data.

Collect

We help people combine their existing data with crowd sourced data from apps and flexible forms.

Understand

We help people understand their data with custom reports, dynamic maps and graphs.

Share

We help people share their data through integrated social media and our open developer platform.

With native mobile apps, dynamic visualizations, and critical data infrastructure.

Web + Mobile Apps

We create web and mobile applications to help people crowd source, manage, and share their data.

Visualizations

We create dynamic visualizations to support legal cases and enhance digital editorial content.

Data

We create tailored data infrastructures that help business and organizations effectively manage data.
